ANU.name: Penny Kyburz
interest: Video games, game design, play experience, user testing, usability, HCI, interaction design, AI, technology policy, technology regulation, privacy, piracy, copyright
ANU.biography: I have also worked to encourage women in technology for many years and lead an initiative at QUT to attract more women into games and IT.
project: GameFlow: modelling, measuring, understanding, evaluating enjoyment in video games
